grape.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: one of a number of small round green or purple fruits that grow together on a vine. Grapes are often used for making wine
grape.translation[0].note_box[0].section: one of a number of small round green or purple fruits that grow together on a vine. Grapes are often used for making wine
I've brought you a bunch of grapes.
Different grape varieties produce wines of widely different character.
There are 2,000 acres of vines in England, compared with 2.6 million in France.
He left the grapes on the vine as long as possible â€” sometimes even late into October.
a piece of land where grapevines are grown in order to produce wine
The wine is from one of Germany's most famous vineyards.
